body:
Ok, I was also trying to be 100% sure that it was impossible to do this just with the current implementation of `go get`, I agree with you that is better to don't execute code during a `go get`.
If with a `go get` is not possible we are going to try to find any other way, perhaps Bazel or just go with the `go get || (go build && go get)` option.

Thanks a lot!
